Text:
Many Many Thanks for this Criterion Collection. Its really thankless job, but I salute ur dedication to bring us this kind of movies at so large scale. I have observed that u upload atleast 5 movies everyday. it must be tiring job, and this makes me hesitate to ask u to upload on demand.
I just want to bring into ur notice that if u get some time please look at these movie links no good quality torrent is available for these:
The Man Who Wasn't There (2001): http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0243133/
Maria Full of Grace (2004): http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0390221/
La Haine (1995): http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0113247/

Thanks in advance. I have recently downloaded "naked" and "blackmoon" by u. All eyes for "Transformers 3: Dark of the Moon" and "Ben Hur 50th Anniversary Edition" Blu ray.
